keyMoments.title: Officer Agents Meeting at Rain Dinners
keyMoments.description: The Baroque Works officer agents gather for a secret meeting with their boss for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: First assembly of all officer agents to receive final orders for Operation Utopia.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 0's Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: The officer agents learn that their mysterious leader Mr. 0 is actually Crocodile, a Warlord of the Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation that connects the criminal organization to a powerful government-sanctioned pirate.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3 Executed
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 is removed from Baroque Works through execution for his failure to eliminate the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's ruthless leadership and consequences for failure.

goals.goal: Operation Utopia - Overthrow the Kingdom of Arabasta

trivia: The organization operates on a codename system where members only know their direct partners
Officer agents were unaware of their leader's true identity until Episode 104
